contentList.content: The Undead Soul, a sorcerer entwined with death, harnesses the spectral energies of undeath. Weaving a haunting tapestry, they command the essence of the departed. As their power grows, the line between life and death blurs, and they become a conduit for negative energy.
Your affinity with negative energy grants you additional spells according to your nature.
You gain proficiency in Death Saving Throws and your Hit Point Maximum increases by 1 every time you take level in Sorcerer Class.
You are Resistant to Necrotic Damage. Your Necrotic Damage bypasses any resistance (not immunity) the enemy may have to it.
Once per day, when your companion falls, you can use your Reaction and spend 4 Sorcery Points to restore half of his health.
You can't use Death's Gift until Long Rest.
